title: klien_br
author: klien_br
content: Yes, you read it right.Inbounding a campaign for almost every account. [Ranking from member to Legendary]Stand a chance to earn from $20 upto $200 for almost doing nothing.---- Allowed ------ If account is inactive since a long time- If account had bad quality posts- If account has posts in language other than englishGet paid instant in BTC [Payments in BTC so posted here]Escrow will be chosen from trusted escrow list.- note : no more details in public so please don't ask about it. Further details will be shared on telegram. Selection would be done from clients over there.Also note: it is not any kind of shilling or bumping service. It is nothing which will violate the forum rules.Telegram : @M3RC303SFormat to apply in telegram :Code:Username :Forum profile link :Rank :BTC address :

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on June 12, 2023, 08:19:15 PMYes, you read it right.Inbounding a campaign for almost every account. [Ranking from member to Legendary]Stand a chance to earn from $20 upto $200 for almost doing nothing.This is too good to be true, offering cash for doing nothing always is a good way to attract attention but will question the scheme.Quote---- Allowed ------ If account is inactive since a long time- If account had bad quality posts- If account has posts in language other than englishWhen you have these kinds of qualifications you can easily figure out that the campaign or whatever is not a high-quality campaign, bad quality posters do not even deserves to get pennies here.QuoteAlso note: it is not any kind of shilling or bumping service. It is nothing that will violate the forum rules.It already violated forum rules because you are already looking for spammers

comments.author: klien_br
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on June 12, 2023, 08:52:18 PMIt already violated forum rules because you are already looking for spammers Not really. Spammers are the ones tagged red.I feel the rest are just incapable but they do deserve rewards for whatever efforts they take.Their english might not be good, or they might not understand the basics or might be any other reason. But still, they are taking efforts which needs to be payed for.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.created_time: June 12, 2023, 10:15:20 PMLast edit: June 12, 2023, 10:33:00 PM by coolcoinz
comments.body: Quote from: klien_br on June 12, 2023, 09:51:18 PMNot really. Spammers are the ones tagged red.I'll tell you who should be tagged red. Account sellers.Quote from: klien_br on September 19, 2022, 06:44:09 PMSelling a legendary account with email & private keys.Bid starts : $250Drop your telegram for further conversation.QuoteTheir english might not be good, or they might not understand the basics or might be any other reason. But still, they are taking efforts which needs to be payed for.Like yours?A warning to whoever thinks this is a legit offer. OP doesn't want to make a deal with you on the forum and wants to talk via telegram. You'll probably be invited to a private group where you'll be asked to pump shitcoins or advertise ponzi schemes. That's why he doesn't want to leave a trace here on the forum. They may also want to scam you by making you do a job for free.Or it's this: QuoteAbout the project - it would be a platform where users need to bring other users on board in order to earn something. Yeah we know this looks ponzi/scam and for that we were building a completely decentralized platform where no one would actually have control.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: OP is someone you should not trust in doing business the writing is on the wall if these tags are not showing on your end when looking at this discussion you have to dig deep into his profile.There's a lot of risk in doing business with this guy, well someone who has a bad character will agree to work with him.
